patthana13.12:5.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.2: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.3: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.4: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.5: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.12:6.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:6.2: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:6.3: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:6.4: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:6.5: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.12:7.1: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:7.2: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:7.3: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:7.4: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:7.5: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto ca namahaggato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.12:8.1: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:8.2: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:8.3: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana13.12:9.1: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:9.2: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:9.3: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:9.4: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:9.5: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:10.1: Hetuyā tevīsa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa … pe … aññamaññe soḷasa … pe … purejāte āsevane nava … pe … avigate tevīsa.
